forum.content:
Maybe it's the stress of midterm, or maybe I'm just bored to death
add me and have a full English conversation. There might be voice messages, typing, and picture exchanges, feel free to chat with me, I won't judge anyone's English level and will gladly show you maybe the more often used expression.
If you feel like it, add me
Remember, when adding, write "hi, i want an English practice partner"
forum.title: Want to practice speaking?
